snippet.title: SwiftUI: CalculatorButtons with Enumeration and Switches (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
When you have a finite set of data such as calculator buttons, its a good idea to represent them using an Enumeration.  I'll go over how to combine this strategy with Switch/Cases to layout the buttons in our application.  Enjoy.

Ep 1: https://youtu.be/ULEFrRSPXFE

Maps UIKit SwiftUI
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Maps-UIKit-SwiftUI

Fullstack Social NodeJS iOS HTML:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Fullstack-Social-iOS-NodeJS-REST
